hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo apt-get install -y wget tar unzip git make gcc maven export SRC_ROOT=`pwd`
cd $SRC_ROOT/ wget http://public.dhe.ibm.com/ibmdl/export/pub/systems/cloud/runtimes/java/8.0.4.10/linux/s390x/ibm-java-s390x-sdk-8.0-4.10.bin sudo chmod +x ibm-java-s390x-sdk-8.0-4.10.bin echo "LICENSE_ACCEPTED=TRUE\nUSER_INSTALL_DIR=/opt/ibm/java-s390x-80\n-fileOverwrite_/opt/ibm/java-s390x-80_uninstall/uninstall.lax=Yes" > installer.properties cat installer.properties sudo ./ibm-java-s390x-sdk-8.0-4.10.bin -f installer.properties -i silent export JAVA_HOME=/opt/ibm/java-s390x-80 export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version
cd $SRC_ROOT/ git clone https://github.com/linux-on-ibm-z/mule.git cd mule git checkout mule-3.8.4-s390x
cd $SRC_ROOT/mule export PATH=$PATH:$SRC_ROOT/mule/distributions/standalone/src/main/resources/conf
mvn clean install -DskipDistributions=false -DskipTests -Pdistributions -fn
tar xzvf $SRC_ROOT/mule/distributions/standalone/target/mule-standalone-3.8.4.tar.gz -C $SRC_ROOT export PATH=$PATH:$SRC_ROOT/mule-standalone-3.8.4/bin
cd $SRC_ROOT wget http://wrapper.tanukisoftware.com/download/3.5.30/wrapper-linux-390-64-3.5.30-st.tar.gz tar -xvzf wrapper-linux-390-64-3.5.30-st.tar.gz cp $SRC_ROOT/wrapper-linux-390-64-3.5.30-st/bin/wrapper $SRC_ROOT/mule-standalone-3.8.4/lib/boot/exec
mule cd $SRC_ROOT/mule mvn clean install -DskipDistributions=false -fn
